Description: Ostracon, large section of the body of a grey-buff-coloured pottery wine-jar with one handle surviving, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip, now much darkened, and faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393625) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393625)
